title: Perma banned for simply communicating??

embed.description: Easily capture screenshots, GIFs, and replays that are ready to share. Download the free app for windows and mac.

body:
Game 1
In-Game
Dinerø: i miss x :(
Dinerø: trundle come back
Dinerø: i cant believe she just lived with2 hp
Dinerø: all u morde
Dinerø: ur welcome
Dinerø: say thank u rt now or else i afk
Dinerø: who
Dinerø: im not
Dinerø: u got caught
Dinerø: because 2v4
Dinerø: isnt ideal
Dinerø: ur welcome
Dinerø: kas is trash
Dinerø: lol
Dinerø: good push
Dinerø: great shot calling lucian!!
Dinerø: our team is so cancer
Dinerø: morde casss swain trundle and lucian
Dinerø: he has scripts
Dinerø: bad baron
Dinerø: i knew
Dinerø: it
Dinerø: how does that happen
Dinerø: gj mundo
Dinerø: get me while ur team dies
Dinerø: hahaha
Dinerø: whats wrong with blitz?
Dinerø: hes doing fine
Dinerø: nah i want to keep playing
Dinerø: till elder
Dinerø: im not ending till we get soul
Dinerø: why not go for drag
Dinerø: u fools
Dinerø: lol gg
Dinerø: we going to lose
Dinerø: this team
Dinerø: is trolling
Dinerø: chasing a kass
Dinerø: and mf
Dinerø: good stuff
Dinerø: u guys are trolling
Dinerø: why not go for drag
Dinerø: like wtf
Dinerø: its soul
Dinerø: inferno
Dinerø: gg
Dinerø: lol this team trolled so hard lmao
Dinerø: all we had to do was get soul
Dinerø: so simple
Dinerø: morde
Dinerø: how about u ult mundo instead of mf
Dinerø: i will handle the rest
Dinerø: but its too late for that now
Dinerø: its gg
Dinerø: u guys didnt want to get soul
Dinerø: for some odd reason
Dinerø: TRUNDLE
Dinerø: ATTACK
Dinerø: THE INHIB
Dinerø: lol now they got soul
Dinerø: gg
Dinerø: this jg is actually hard core trolling
Dinerø: we had a 3-1 drag lead
Dinerø: we had a 3-1 drag lead
Dinerø: and ths team refused to get soul
Dinerø: soul would have secured our win
Dinerø: its a 4v5
Dinerø: stop chasing pls
Dinerø: like wth
Dinerø: gg
Dinerø: u did good morde
Dinerø: keep ulting him
Dinerø: can u guys PLEASE
Dinerø: stop targeting mundo
Dinerø: like fr
Dinerø: gg
Dinerø: no one wants to target mf or kass
Dinerø: just the tanks
Dinerø: lmao
Dinerø: what a joke

Hi fellow summoners, i am writing to you today because i feel like i was somehow cheated. yes i understand the summoners code. but from the logs i was given and the environment of the game i dont feel like i deserve a punishment at all, yes i used caps and said my jungle was trolling but i wasn't flaming anyone at all i was encouraging the lucian, telling morde to ult mundo instead. maybe i might have typed it in a somewhat aggressive manner but i was just simply communicating to my teammates. it doesnt show a time stamps on my logs but in my defence it was a 50 min game, we were hard throwing and all we needed to do was get soul as you seen the logs, the parts where i say "say thank u rt now or else i afk" i was simply just joking, "im not ending till we get soul" also again i wasn't being serious because the 4th drag already spawned i was simply just joking around because i thought we had the game in the bag. "u fools" i dont think calling somebody a fool is "toxic" or flaming. During this whole game nobody was being toxic towards anyone at all we were all having fun because we had a huge lead, which lead up to use throwing. to tell you the truth i dont even think anyone on my team reported me i barely talked in all chat other than the one time at mundo as well. i just simply feel that this ban was a mistake and need help. i dont believe that these logs are enough to ban me because even on the riot website they say what can get you banned "Here are some common examples of why a suspension might be issued: Use of offensive language Deliberate verbal abuse Naming and shaming Tribunal ban on your account Hate speech Posting malicious phishing links" when did i use offensive language towards my team in any way. i didn't abuse my team at all i was just trying to communicate to win.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Dinerø,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EYNn9EHm,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-02-26T02:58:27.689+0000)
>
>  i dont think calling somebody a fool is "toxic" or flaming. 

That's where you are wrong.

but how though it was just at a point of the game where we had to go get drag and we just didnt rotate good. even so. at the end of the day me and my teammates were just talking to each other we weren't being toxic towards each other at all

> [{quoted}](name=Dinerø,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=990yGJEX,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2020-02-26T03:21:32.510+0000)
>
> me and my teammates were just talking to each other we  weren't being toxic towards each other at all

You think like that cos your definition of toxicity is incorrect. 

The toxicity in your chat is minor, but since the system punishes based on consistency x severity,  minor toxicity over many games will still get you punished.

Well, I guess you did communicate that you think your team was trash cancer script fool trolls, but that's not really what Riot has in mind when they give you the ability to chat, y'know?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

i think you might have misunderstood i never said my team was cancer in that way i was implying our team comp is really strong. for the scripts part i was telling my team that the mundo had scripts cuz he was dodging all of our abilities as a joke lol. i said my team was trolling didn't call them trolls just simply said we were trolling. i wish you could see the time stamps and all chats but it doesnt show. i didnt call anyone on the enemy team trash

> [{quoted}](name=Dinerø,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=990yGJEX,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2020-02-26T03:27:42.746+0000)
>
> i said my team was trolling didn't call them trolls just simply said we were trolling

https://i.imgur.com/fAVr5d9.gifv

I normally come into these threads to laugh because people almost 100% of the time deserve a perma. I cannot believe you were even chat restricted. A few little annoying comments "gg" and "our team is trolling lol" but overall the only legitimate put-down was "u fools" and I can't fathom how that's a bannable word. I consistently have games where people call each other "bitch" and "fucker" and "Re-----" (won't finish that one, but you probably understand). The fact that the auto system picked up on "u fools" is kind of a head scratcher. Good luck with Riot support pal, I honestly don't believe this was bannable, ESPECIALLY permanent (unless of course, you have a multitude of punishments and you were on your last leg, in which case I get the perma).

PS. My friend once got a 14-day for calling somebody a "Little Pooper", which, coincidentally was the name of his club at the time. Riot support told him "Even mild toxicity is still toxicity". You might be fooked lmao
Thats what im trying to say i dont understand where from one game i could have gotten the perma banned, like i actually dont know who reported me. i hope someone can help me

> [{quoted}](name=Dinerø,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=990yGJEX,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2020-02-26T04:02:02.636+0000)
>
> Thats what im trying to say i dont understand where from one game i could have gotten the perma banned, like i actually dont know who reported me. i hope someone can help me

Typically, the punishment system follows an escalation pattern of;

10 game chat restrict
25 game chat restrict
14 day ban
perma

If you recently have had a 14-day ban and had not gone down on the punishment ladder then the next punishment is a perma-ban. Looking at your match history you have a 14-day gap less than a month ago. If this was due to a 14-day ban the perma-ban you're getting now can not only be blamed on the one game. The punishment is also due to your punishment history.

If you have not had a 14-day ban previously then something likely went wrong and you can talk to support about it.

hello i am aware of the 14 day ban, in this case yes i did receive it. but i never once received a 25 game chat restrict at all. i was very aware that my account was going to get perma banned though since i had the 14 day ban. thats why i chose my words wisely and going back to my logs im just confused into where my it shows in my logs where i was even being toxic towards my teammates or anyone. if anything i was just talking about the soul because thats all we needed to secure our win. but i was just simply using the chat to communicate with my teammates and trying to get soul. i even congratulated my team mates throughout the game telling morde to ult mundo instead of mf. tellng trundle to attack the nexus in all caps. might have been too much but even then i dont think that should give me a punishment

Almost all of that was either attempting to hold the team hostage ("im not ending till we get soul") then insulting the team for not going for dragon. The rest of chat is peppered with stuff like this but this part was the easiest example.

You're on thin ice when you're recently off a 14-day ban, and if you reached the 14 day ban without any chat restrictions that would imply your first punishment was an escalation based on zero tolerance stuff.

Dinerø: nah i want to keep playing

ok see i had a feeling this was the bad part only because the holding them hostage, but if u were too look at the timestamps (which you cant) during the time i said that the 4th dragon for soul was actually already up. me and my teammates were just joking around. because i wasn't  actually trying to not get dragon because we actually ended up losing the fight which lead to me calling them "fools" but calling someone a fool is enough to ban me? but you also have to take in the context of my logs are just responses to my team mates, we were all joking around having a good time because we were that ahead and we just ended up throwing i was mainly only typing because my team mates were typing together i actually enjoyed playing with that team which is why i dont understand why i got reported or who reported me

I understand i threatened to afk but that all just as a joke because a play right before i said that mordekaieser said it to me which is why i said that, and i never called anyone trash in all chat i was simply stating to my team that the enemy kass was not good. i never called anyone cancer at all, i fully said our TEAM is cancer as in our champs you can clearly tell i listed them right after saying that none of those comments were meant to be toxic in any way other than, saying "trolling'. im not allowed to say we are going to lose?

When you get a 14 day ban, ANY valid report will get you perma'd. One is all it takes. You are told this when you receive the 14-day ban. While this is not the most egregious chat log, it's still largely negative. You scold your team for chasing, you have a defeatist attitude, and you threaten to afk. The report was valid, and you were already on thin ice. 

Additionally, you went straight to a 14 day ban without receiving a chat restriction. This usually indicates that you're fond of using zero tolerance words, or else that your first offenses were extremely toxic. Your ban was deserved. For the future, if you make a new account, you should work on keeping your chat positive or not using the chat if you can't control your anger in the moment.

That's insane if you actually got a perma for that chat. I'm in a similar situation myself. I just had a 10+ year old account 14 day suspended and I don't understand why. My chat log was just as minor. It actually makes me feel a bit better someone else has something similarly crazy happen. Maybe the system is just going wacky lately? I hope you sent a support ticket in and get this overturned. Good Luck.

Never seen a game more pathetic with its bans than this game, shame on riot
